revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Wifly-CIty |model = IDU-2770UG-11N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 2770 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0D:0A
|chip1 = Ralink;RT2770;RT2770F, N1C6930D0, 0942ST; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2720; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "UN102C V3.0" is silkscreened on the board in the images shown below. :A date code (year+week) of '''0943''' (Oct. 19 to 25, 2009) is also on the board.
The shell is clearly modeled after the '''[[ALFA Network]]''' AWUS036H (and subsequent variants).
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_top.jpg|top Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_bot.jpg|bottom, label Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_seal.jpg|seal </gallery> <gallery caption="internal"> Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_board_top.jpg|board top Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_RT2770.jpg|RT2770F MAC/BB Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_board_bot.jpg|board bottom Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_shell_internal_topside.jpg|top shell,underside Image:Wifly-City_IDU-2770UG-11N_shell_internal_underside.jpg|bottom shell, underside </gallery> <gallery caption="old terrible-quality scans"> File:Wiflycity IDU-2770UG-11N top.jpg|top of the PCB File:Wiflycity IDU-2770UG-11N bot.jpg|bottom of the PCB </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
